definition[1]: one of the curved pieces of wood fixed to the bottom of a rocking chair, that allows it to move backwards and forwards if you push it
definition[2]: a member of a group of young people in Britain in the 1960s who wore leather jackets, rode motorcycles, and listened to rock ‘n’ roll music
definition[3]: a musician who plays rock ‘n’ roll music, or someone who likes this kind of music
